qiskit_aqua.components.oracles package¶

Submodules¶

qiskit_aqua.components.oracles.oracle module¶

This module contains the definition of a base class for Oracle.

class qiskit_aqua.components.oracles.oracle.Oracle[source]¶

Bases: qiskit_aqua.pluggable.Pluggable

Base class for oracles to be used with the Grover algorithm.

This method should initialize the module and its configuration, and use an exception if a component of the module is available.

Parameters:configuration (dict) – configuration dictionary
ancillary_register¶
static check_pluggable_valid()¶

Checks if pluggable is ready for use. Throws an exception if not

configuration¶

Return pluggable configuration.

Construct the oracle circuit.

Returns:A quantum circuit for the oracle.
evaluate_classically(assignment)[source]¶

For an assignment, check the oracle result (True|False) classically :param assignment: a particular variable assignment :type assignment: list of bools

Returns:The True|False value of the oracle under the given variable assignment
